analysis.description:
BlockonixToken.upgrade (/unique_chucks/5/0x741f58cd68d24f361cc0ee0d3aaf7df2bf16132e.sol#296-300) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-oldToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,oldTokenBurnAddress,balance) (/unique_chucks/5/0x741f58cd68d24f361cc0ee0d3aaf7df2bf16132e.sol)

Reentrancy in BlockonixToken.upgrade (/unique_chucks/5/0x741f58cd68d24f361cc0ee0d3aaf7df2bf16132e.sol#296-300):
	External calls:
	- balance = oldToken.balanceOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/5/0x741f58cd68d24f361cc0ee0d3aaf7df2bf16132e.sol#298-300)
	- oldToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,oldTokenBurnAddress,balance) (/unique_chucks/5/0x741f58cd68d24f361cc0ee0d3aaf7df2bf16132e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/5/0x741f58cd68d24f361cc0ee0d3aaf7df2bf16132e.sol)

HasAddresses.founder1FirstLockup should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x741f58cd68d24f361cc0ee0d3aaf7df2bf16132e.sol#88-89)
